project.description: Build a new Eucalyptus Cloud from Packages.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: hostname
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: IP address or hostname of machine you would like to install on.

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: password
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: Leave blank if you've uploaded your ssh keys

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: configuration
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description:
Configuration of the Eucalyptus deployment.
Required fields: public-ips
Full list of attributes can be found here: https://github.com/viglesiasce/eucalyptus-cookbook/blob/master/attributes/default.rb

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: role="cloud-in-a-box" if [ $password ];then knife bootstrap $hostname --no-host-key-verify -r "role[$role]" -j "`cat config.json`" -P $password else knife bootstrap $hostname --no-host-key-verify -r "role[$role]" -j "`cat config.json`" fi
